hook.text: Nurses, therapists, and social workers listen to pain for a living. Eventually, many stop feeling anything at all.

buildup.text: Compassion fatigue: emotional and physical exhaustion from prolonged empathetic engagement with others' suffering.

discovery.text: Charles Figley found that the most empathetic caregivers are most vulnerable.
